wikipedia_page.main: Edith Mary Swepstone (4 January 1862 – 5 February 1942) was an English composer and music teacher. She was born in Stepney, London, the daughter of a London solicitor. She studied music at the Guildhall School and later worked as a lecturer at the City of London School. She died in Tonbridge, Kent.

response: *Edith Swepstone (1862–1942): String Quartet in g minor, Lyrical Cycle for String Quartet.
